::: {.main-text}

The Maritime Refrigeration Technology Hub website be presented at during this year’s NorFishing in Trondheim. The presentation is part of a miniseries titled “Grønn omstilling i blått hav” presented at Forskningstorget A-120. The presentation will give a short overview of the webpage and explain how the webpage will contribute to collect and disseminate information, experience and knowledge to accelerate the transition towards a refrigeration technology with a low environmental impact in the maritime sector

:::
